sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row>
            <v-col sm="10" class="pa-4 mx-auto">
                <v-card class="pa-2">
                    <v-img :src="`/${post.image}`"></v-img>
                    <v-card-actions class="pb-0">
                        <v-row class="mt-1 mx-1">
                            <v-col sm="2">
                                <v-btn small outlined color="primary">
                                    {{ post.categoria }}
                                </v-btn>
                            </v-col>
                        </v-row>
                    </v-card-actions>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import API from '../api';

export default {
    data(){
        return {
            post: {},
        };
    },
    async created(){
        const response = await API.getPostByID(this.$route.params.id);
        this.post = response;
    }
};
</script>
